column3: Traffic;Poipet: A man died at the scene of a car and motorcycle accident on October 23
column6: Banteay Meanchey province.------The deceased was riding a motorcycle and was named as Nam Yi was from Poipet City. The driver of the car
column9: is a police officer in Banteay Meanchey province
column10: currently residing in Poipet.------The driver of the Isuzu D-MAX right-hand drive vehicle
column12: hit the motorbike and attempted to escape
column13: but was soon arrested and immediately detained at Poipet City Inspectorate. ------On October 24
column15: the deputy inspector general of traffic
column16: said that the force was questioning and building up the case for legal action. ------AREY NEWS
